content: The game was super short, the "puzzles" were incredibly easy, the robots move really slowly, and *spoiler alert* you never even get to the city OR find the bird!!! Don't waste your money. More importantly, don't waste your time! (Graphics were kind of cute though, I'll give it that. still not worth it!)
Really awful. After completing the game I have no idea what the story line was supposed to be about. Very expensive for very limited play time. I absolutely do not recommend this game.
below par copywriting, uninteresting storytelling. Not intriguing enough to be a paid game. Waste of money.
great atmosphere and graphics, but too short
Lovely. Beautiful story and art. I only wish it had lasted longer

Neat little game, but way too short for it being a paid app. Game play is ok overall, can be a little cluncky, but nothing that will hinder you. Hints are fairly clear, but if you have issues with problem solving, then you might get frustrated. Story was nice and seemed like it could have gone on for much longer than it did. All in all, I don't regret getting it, but I wouldn't have gotten it if I knew how short it was.

I probably would have given it 5 stars but for two things. First, the dialogue. There is no way to get through it quickly. You have to just wait as it slowly goes through. Not horrible but a little frustrating. Second, it ends fairly abruptly. They give you an idea of what happened in the end but it felt unfinished. Other than that it was a great game.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your 4 reviews, and your support is our motivation, we will continue to optimize our game and give you a better experience in the future. If you have any other suggestion, please contact us again

content: only tried this game, because I enjoyed Isoland 2. This game to me is frustratingly awful. No instructions, terrible hints. I uninstalled after messing with the game for a half hour and getting no where. Game is just not for me.
its more of a kids story than an adult's adventure game. puzzles super easy, story short and childish
the controls were good, the graphics were great, BUT THE GAME ANC STORY IS SO BOOOOORRRRIIIINNNNGGGG! Can I have a refund please?

Great game, loved it, but it felt like it had something missing. It seemed like it ended too abruptly. Are we looking forward to a sequel? This game has a lot of diversities and has surely improved the point-and-click adventure types of games.

Abi is a good game and a wonderful experience to play. But their developers so not seem that good at their response. About a month ago my friend accidentally brought this app so I contacted Google to rufund the money, they said that they can't refund it, I should contact the developer. I contacted the developers and their reply was that I should contact Google play for a refund,I told them that I have already contacted Google. 3 weeks passed by and still they've not replied.
replyContent:
Greetings,
If you bought our game through Google Play, we recommend you to contact Google Play support for the refund.
Thank you for the understanding.
Hi, What problem have you encountered? If you have any problems in the game, you can provide detailed information and contact us at (service@lilithgames.com)

content:
Excellent game play but too slow game . Look like play slow motion game . 
Switch character also not working properly . You deserve more then 5 start 
but please fix this add options to set graphic low high normal . I have lg 
q6 3gb ram Waste of money
replyContent: Hello, when the character is walking, it is slow indeed, this is in order to offer better game experience for players. Could you tell us what kind of problem you have when you switch character? We will make it adaptive for more model of device in the following.

content:
Good but very short. The game was fun a but it ended very abruptly after 
only a few puzzles
replyContent:
Hi, thanks for your 5 stars review, we are so glad you love our game and Abi.
We will do better in the future. If you have any suggestion, please tell us, thank you.
